parameters:
\N<Luda Soldier>This is the training institution of Luda. If you have no
business here, leave before unnecessary suspicion falls upon
you.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>
A
\N<Luda Soldier>Can't you see? I'm studying, so don't talk to me...

\N<Luda Soldier>My dad is fighting in the training corps... It's still okay
for now, but I wonder what will happen to me and mom if he
ever loses...

\N<Luda Soldier>What am I even coming here for... To become a soldier of
Luda? Or maybe...

\N<Luda Soldier>Who...? If you have no business, please go over there. I
don't want to be seen by the Luda soldiers.

\N<Man>Here is where the children of the town learn. It used to be
a pure place of study, but...
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Riia>Mom...! Are, are you okay...!?

\N<Segi>...Yeah. I'm totally fine. Didn't I tell you? I was just
being teased a little by someone I know.
\N<Riia>But... I...

\N<Segi>Riia, you can't do such things to a girl, okay? It's a
promise with mom, right?
\N<Riia>...I know.
A

\N<Segi>Riia, you mustn't do such things to girls, okay? It's a
promise with Mama, right?
\N<Riia>...I know.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Riia>What's wrong, Mom? Why are you here...
\N<Segi>Sorry, there's something I wanted to ask you.

\N<Segi>Recently... Have you noticed anything different about Rame-
chan? Has Riia thought something was off?
\N<Riia>Something different...? I don't think there's anything...

\N<Segi>Really? You see, Mom was asked by Irime-san... Rame-chan's
mom. She's been worried because Rame-chan has been acting
strange lately.
\N<Riia>...

\N<Segi>But... I see. If Riia doesn't know, then maybe it's just a
misunderstanding.

\N<Segi>Understood, I'll tell Rame-chan's mom that there's nothing
wrong. Can you forget about it too, Riia? I'm sorry for
asking such a strange question.
\N<Riia>Actually... I've been a little concerned too.

\N<Riia>Lately, Rame-chan often seems to have a sad look on her
face.
\N<Segi>...You have no idea why?
\N<Riia>...
\N<Segi>Fubii... He...

\N<Riia>...I don't know if it's related. But I've often seen the two
of them talking recently.

\N<Riia>I don't know what they're doing, but... after that, Rame-
chan always looks sad...

\N<Segi>...Understood, thank you for telling me. If that's the case,
Mom will ask him about it, so don't worry, Riia?
\N<Riia>...Yeah.
DW_目標設定 Go_to_talk_to_Fubii.
B

\N<Riia>...I'm not sure if it's related, but I've often seen the two
of them talking together lately.

\N<Riia>I don't know what they're doing, but... after that, Rame-
chan always looks sad...
